ApiKey: Set as user secret in development, and as environment variable in production

TwitterClientOptions.AccessToken: Set as user secret in development, and as environment variable in production
TwitterClientOptions.AccessTokenSecret: Set as user secret in development, and as environment variable in production
TwitterClientOptions.ConsumerKey: Set as user secret in development, and as environment variable in production
TwitterClientOptions.ConsumerKeySecret: Set as user secret in development, and as environment variable in production
